## Voice.connect() method

Create an outgoing call.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
connect(token: string, params?: Record<string, any>): Promise<Call>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  token | string | A Twilio Access Token, usually minted by an authentication-gated endpoint using a Twilio helper library. |
|  params | Record&lt;string, any&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Custom parameters to send to the TwiML Application. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Call](./voice-react-native-sdk.call_class.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A `Promise` that - Resolves with a call when the call is created.

## Remarks

Note that the resolution of the returned `Promise` does not imply any call event occurring, such as answered or rejected.
